text: PREcision Audit LLC Excellence Scholarship Created | PREcision Audit LLC Excellence Scholarship Created The PREcision Audit LLC Excellence Scholarship is a monetary award in the amount of $2,500. It is awarded in the spring to two undergraduate students pursuing a degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering at FSU Panama City. Recipients must possess and maintain a minimum 3.5 GPA and must be enrolled in at least 6 credit hours. Applicants must also demonstrate participation in extracurricular activities, indicating broader interests than solely the coursework, as well as community service, demonstrating a level of compassion and concern for others.  This funding is set to last 8-10 semesters.
